snippet: Daredevil vignettes devised by Brian Sanders for his company, Junk, rely heavily on props and precarious contraptions.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews New York debut of Brian Sanders's dance company Junk, at Pace University's Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts.
lead_paragraph: Daredevil vignettes devised by Brian Sanders for his company, Junk, rely heavily on props and precarious contraptions.

headline.seo: Brian Sanders’s Junk Infuses Choreography With Props
headline.main: Dancing With Doors and Amid Trash Cans
headline.print_headline: Dancing With Doors and Amid Trash Cans
